title: Research Topic: PayPal Mafia Political Network Analysis (2002-2025)
summary: Based on the research priority 'PayPal Mafia Political Network Analysis (2002-2025)', this event represents a significant development in the area described as: Map the systematic coordination of PayPal alumni across tech platforms, venture capital, government contracts, and political influence... This event demonstrates the interconnected nature of global kleptocracy and corruption networks, involving multiple actors across jurisdictions and highlighting the need for coordinated international response.
